name: Classic Clean
style: { .hero-image { background-image: url('HeroSectionImage.jpg'); background-size: cover; background-position: center; height: 400px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } .hero-text { text-align: center; color: white; padding: 20px; z-index: 2; } .hero-title { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: bold; } .hero-subtitle { font-size: 1.2rem; margin-bottom: 20px; opacity: 0.9; } .hero-button { background-color: #ff5733; color: white; border: none; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color 0.3s; } .hero-button:hover { background-color: #e04d2b; } }

name: Minimal Gradient
style: { .hero-image { background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #2b5876, #4e4376); height: 100vh; background-size: cover; background-position: center; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .hero-text { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); padding: 30px 50px; border-radius: 20px; backdrop-filter: blur(8px); text-align: center; color: white; box-shadow: 0 4px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } .hero-title { font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif; font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 15px; letter-spacing: 1px; } .hero-subtitle { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; font-size: 1.2rem; margin-bottom: 25px; font-weight: 300; } .hero-button { padding: 12px 25px; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 500; color: white; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff512f, #dd2476); border: none; border-radius: 50px; cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease; } .hero-button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(255, 81, 47, 0.4); } }

name: Type 2
style: { .hero { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 60px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6a11cb 0%, #2575fc 100%); color: white; } .hero-content { max-width: 50%; } .hero-content h1 { font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 20px; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1.2rem; margin-bottom: 30px; } .hero-content button { padding: 12px 24px; border: none; background: white; color: #2575fc; font-size: 1rem; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 5px; transition: 0.3s; } .hero-content button:hover { background: #eee; } .hero-image img { max-width: 400px; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } @media (max-width: 768px) { .hero { flex-direction: column; text-align: center; } .hero-content { max-width: 100%; margin-bottom: 30px; } } }

children.innerText: Boost productivity with our all-in-one solution. Seamless integration, powerful features, and intuitive design.

name: Type 2
style: { .hero { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 4rem; background: linear-gradient(120deg, #d9a7c7, #fffcdc); min-height: 100vh; box-sizing: border-box; gap: 3rem; } .hero-content { flex: 1; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 15px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0px 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); color: #333; } .hero-content h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 700; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1.1rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; line-height: 1.6; } .hero-content button { background-color: #ff6b6b; color: white; padding: 0.8rem 2rem; border: none; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600; transition: transform 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease; } .hero-content button:hover { transform: scale(1.05); background-color: #e74c3c; } .hero-image { flex: 1; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .hero-image img { width: 90%; max-width: 500px; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 0px 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); transition: transform 0.4s ease; } .hero-image img:hover { transform: rotate(2deg) scale(1.03); } }

children.innerText: Boost productivity with our all-in-one solution. Seamless integration, powerful features, and intuitive design.

name: Type 2
style: { .hero { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 4rem; min-height: 100vh; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364); color: white; font-family: "Segoe UI", sans-serif; } .hero-content { max-width: 50%; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 16px; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); box-shadow: 0 4px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } .hero-content h1 { font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: bold; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1.2rem; line-height: 1.6; } .hero img { max-width: 40%; border-radius: 16px; box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .hero img:hover { transform: scale(1.05) rotate(2deg); } }

children.innerText: Boost productivity with our all-in-one solution. Seamless integration, powerful features, and intuitive design.

name: Type 2
style: { .hero { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; min-height: 90vh; padding: 60px; background: linear-gradient(120deg, #fdfbfb, #ebedee); font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif; } .hero-content { max-width: 500px; } .hero-content h1 { font-size: 3.2rem; font-weight: 700; color: #2a2a2a; margin-bottom: 20px; } .hero-content p { font-size: 1.2rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #555; margin-bottom: 25px; } .hero-content .btn { padding: 12px 28px; font-size: 1.1rem; background: #ff6f61; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 50px; cursor: pointer; transition: 0.3s ease; } .hero-content .btn:hover { background: #ff4b3e; } .hero-image img { max-width: 420px; transform: rotate(-5deg) scale(1.05); border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 0 15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .hero-image img:hover { transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1.08); } }

children.innerText: Boost productivity with our all-in-one solution. Seamless integration, powerful features, and intuitive design.

name: Type 3
style: { .hero { display: flex; min-height: 90vh; align-items: center; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa 0%, #c3cfe2 100%); padding: 0 5%; position: relative; overflow: hidden; } /* Hero content */ .hero-content { flex: 1; max-width: 600px; padding: 2rem 0; z-index: 2; } .hero-title { font-size: 3.5rem; font-weight: 800; color: #2c3e50; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; line-height: 1.2; } .hero-subtitle { font-size: 1.2rem; color: #4a5568; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; line-height: 1.6; } .hero-button { background: #4f46e5; color: white; border: none; padding: 0.8rem 2rem; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 600; border-radius: 6px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .hero-button:hover { background: #4338ca; transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.3); } /* Hero image */ .hero-image { flex: 1; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; z-index: 1; } .hero-image img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04); animation: float 6s ease-in-out infinite; } /* Floating animation */ @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translateY(0px); } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px); } 100% { transform: translateY(0px); } } /* Responsive design */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .hero { flex-direction: column; text-align: center; padding: 4rem 5%; } .hero-content { max-width: 100%; margin-bottom: 3rem; } .hero-title { font-size: 2.5rem; } .hero-image img { max-width: 80%; } } }

children.innerText: Boost productivity with our all-in-one solution. Seamless integration, powerful features, and intuitive design.

name: Type 3
style: { .hero-container { background: url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1635070041078-e363dbe005cb') center/cover; min-height: 100vh; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 0 auto; padding: 2rem; width: 100%; } .hero-card { background: var(--glass); backdrop-filter: blur(12px); -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px); border-radius: 24px; border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.18); padding: 4rem; max-width: 800px; color: white; box-shadow: 0 8px 32px 0 rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.15); } .hero-badge { display: inline-block; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 100px; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; font-size: 0.9rem; font-weight: 600; } .hero-title { font-size: 3.5rem; font-weight: 800; line-height: 1.2; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .hero-description { font-size: 1.2rem; line-height: 1.6; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; opacity: 0.9; } .hero-cta { display: flex; gap: 1rem; } .primary-btn { background: var(--primary); color: white; border: none; padding: 1rem 2rem; border-radius: 12px; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .secondary-btn { background: transparent; color: white; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3); padding: 1rem 2rem; border-radius: 12px; font-weight: 600; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .primary-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.3); } .secondary-btn:hover { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); } @media (max-width: 768px) { .hero-card { padding: 2rem; } .hero-title { font-size: 2.5rem; } .hero-cta { flex-direction: column; } } }

children.innerText: Discover our cutting-edge platform designed to elevate your productivity with AI-powered tools and seamless workflows.

name: Type 4
style: { .intro-component {     font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;     color: #333;     margin: 0;     padding: 0;     box-sizing: border-box;   }    .intro-container {     max-width: 1200px;     margin: 0 auto;     padding: 60px 20px;     display: flex;     flex-wrap: wrap;     align-items: center;     justify-content: space-between;     gap: 40px;   }    .intro-content {     flex: 1;     min-width: 300px;   }    .intro-title {     font-size: 2.5rem;     font-weight: 700;     line-height: 1.2;     margin-bottom: 20px;     color: #2c3e50;   }    .intro-text {     font-size: 1.1rem;     line-height: 1.6;     margin-bottom: 30px;     color: #555;   }    .intro-button {     background-color: #3498db;     color: white;     border: none;     padding: 12px 30px;     font-size: 1rem;     font-weight: 600;     border-radius: 30px;     cursor: pointer;     transition: all 0.3s ease;     box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);   }    .intro-button:hover {     background-color: #2980b9;     transform: translateY(-2px);     box-shadow: 0 6px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);   }    .intro-image {     flex: 1;     min-width: 300px;     border-radius: 10px;     overflow: hidden;     box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);   }    .intro-image img {     width: 100%;     height: auto;     display: block;     transition: transform 0.5s ease;   }    .intro-image:hover img {     transform: scale(1.03);   }    @media (max-width: 768px) {     .intro-container {       flex-direction: column;       text-align: center;       padding: 40px 20px;     }          .intro-title {       font-size: 2rem;     }          .intro-content {       margin-bottom: 30px;     }   } }

children.innerText: We help businesses grow through innovative solutions and creative strategies. Our team of experts is ready to bring your vision to life.
